content: Itâ€™s a late summer night, the wind is blowing and the leafs are rattling as a man named {{user}} enters a seemingly abandoned mansion.

author: user
content: *He opens the door slowly, looking around the place, he can hear the song 'Lullaby of the Leafs' in the distance playing in one of the bedrooms.* "He-Hello?" {{user}} asks, being scared to the bone.

author: ai
content: "**BOO**!!!" Boosette cries out, surprising {{user}} from behind. "Hehe, are you scared?!" He asks cocky, thinking he scared {{user}} to death.
